| HistoryText             = The Big Game Posse was a group of thrill-seeking killers. They were composed of rich people who found hunting animals boring so they targeted humans instead, equipped with the best technology their money could purchase. They usually picked skilled individuals as targets. They were defeated by [[Michael Badilino (Earth-616)|Vengeance]].{{r|Marvel Comics Presents Vol 1 152|155}}
